results.deck: Quarth is an action/puzzle game released on multiple platforms.
results.name: Quarth

results.deck: This compilation includes the first 4 games in the Fatal Fury series.
results.name: Fatal Fury: Battle Archives Volume 1

results.deck: A Japan-only adventure-horror game published by Success Corp.
results.name: Akai Ito

results.deck: Evil Dead: Regeneration puts Ash into a non-canon world in which he never went back in time after Evil Dead II.  He also gets a half deadite sidekick.
results.name: Evil Dead: Regeneration

results.deck: A low budget street racing game with a focus on customisation.
results.name: Top Gear RPM Tuning

results.deck: Jump in your sports car and stop the criminals from escaping. This sequel to Chase HQ adds the ability to use guns to shoot at criminals.
results.name: Chase H.Q. II: Special Criminal Investigation

results.deck: TimeSplitters 2 is a frantic rush through time to rescue the Time Crystals from the evil TimeSplitters, who would like nothing more than to end mankind's existence.
results.name: TimeSplitters 2

results.deck: Batter Up! It's time for EA Sports' 2002 entry into their baseball franchise Triple Play.
results.name: Triple Play 2002

results.deck: Sega Soccer Slam is a no-holds-barred Soccer game that is available for the Xbox, PS2, and GameCube.  It was also released as an Xbox Original for the Xbox 360 on December 15, 2008.
results.name: Sega Soccer Slam

results.deck: Prince of Persia: Warrior Within is the the second game in the Sands of Time series. Adopting a much darker tone, Warrior Within follows the Prince to the Island of Time as he attempts to change the past in order to end the Dahaka's relentless pursuit.
results.name: Prince of Persia: Warrior Within

results.deck: Gaelic Games: Hurling was released on November 9th 2007 in the UK and Ireland. It was released alongside similar game Gaelic Games: Football 2. This is the first player-controlled Hurling video game.
results.name: Gaelic Games: Hurling
The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas

results.deck: Thunderstrike: Operation Phoenix is a helicopter action game for the PlayStation 2.
results.name: Thunderstrike: Operation Phoenix

results.deck: Purple Haze takes you into the violence and danger that was Vietnam. Choose from six new weapons, attach bayonets to your rifle, and be on the lookout for attacks from fighter jets & B-52 bombers.
results.name: Vietcong: Purple Haze

results.deck: A spin-off of the original Unreal, Unreal Tournament is a fast-paced multiplayer first-person shooter for up to 16 players in six different game modes (from the standard Deathmatch to the mission-based Assault).
results.name: Unreal Tournament

results.deck: The Flash game from Newgrounds hits home consoles in Alien Hominid, a sidescrolling run-and-gun game marking The Behemoth's first foray into console gaming.
results.name: Alien Hominid

results.deck: Construct and furnish a home, and then influence the day-to-day lives of its occupants (called Sims) in an isometrical "people simulator" by Will Wright.
results.name: The Sims

results.deck: An open-world game spoofing 1950s sci-fi films. The player is an alien named Crypto who comes to Earth with the express purpose of wiping out the human race.
results.name: Destroy All Humans!

results.deck: A racing game with cars from the Ford company.
results.name: Ford Mustang: The Legend Lives

results.deck: The game follows the life of Jango Fett as he tries to hunt down the dark jedi Komari Vosa and collect the bounty on her head.
results.name: Star Wars: Bounty Hunter

results.deck: Rez is a musical on-rails shooter that blurs the line between user input and audio/visual feedback, creating a unique sensory experience.
results.name: Rez

results.deck: Driver parallel lines is the fourth game in the Driver video game series. The game features mostly vehicle-based gameplay, with a moderate amount of on-foot sections.
results.name: Driver: Parallel Lines

results.deck: Rogue Ops is a multi platform, third-person stealth game.
results.name: Rogue Ops

results.deck: Ar Tonelico is a role-playing game developed by GUST for Playstation 2. The plot is focused on Reyvateil, an artificial race who assist humans by singing songs.
results.name: Ar tonelico: Melody of Elemia

results.deck: A game based on the cartoon, Codename: Kids Next Door.
results.name: Codename: Kids Next Door - Operation: V.I.D.E.O.G.A.M.E.

results.deck: Espgaluda is a vertical bullet hell shoot' em up developed by Cave.
results.name: Espgaluda

results.deck: Last of Blade compilation containing Last Blade 1 and 2.
results.name: Bakumatsu Roman: Gekka no Kenshi 1+2

results.deck: A playstation 2 game based on the Australian Football League.
results.name: AFL Premiership 2006

results.deck: SNK fighting game similar to Samurai Shodown.
results.name: The Last Blade

results.deck: An action/adventure game based on the Lord of the Rings franchise released to coincide with the final film in the movie trilogy.
results.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

results.deck: A collection of 29 of Taito's classic (and not-so-classic) games from the past including Space Invaders.
results.name: Taito Legends

results.deck: Wild Arms 5 is an RPG by developer Media Vision.
results.name: Wild Arms 5

results.deck: Gran Turismo 4 is the 4th instalment in the PlayStation-exclusive driving simulation series.
results.name: Gran Turismo 4

results.deck: A compilation by Working Designs of Growlanser II and III for the PS2.
results.name: Growlanser Generations

results.deck: When the military takes over a ski resort, you take to the slopes and try to uncover the mystery in this story-based snowboarding game.
results.name: Dark Summit

results.deck: A game about those little cars that ride on grooves. How neat!
results.name: GrooveRider:  Slot Car Thunder

results.deck: A new villain begins his reign on Gotham City, and it's up to Batman and his allies to stop him in this brawler based on The New Adventures of Batman and Robin animated TV series.
results.name: Batman: Rise of Sin Tzu

results.deck: Sniper Elite is a third person action game set against the backdrop of a nearly completed destroyed 1945 Berlin. As a disguised agent, your sniper rifle is your weapon of choice.
results.name: Sniper Elite

results.deck: Play as a Simpsons character and drive around Springfield as you taxi around other famous Springfield residents.
results.name: The Simpsons: Road Rage

results.deck: 989's baseball game for the 2003-2004 season. Released in Japan as MLB 2003.
results.name: MLB 2004

results.deck: Tourist Trophy is a motorcycle racing simulator developed by Polyphony Digital, the creators of the Gran Turismo series.
results.name: Tourist Trophy: The Real Riding Simulator

results.deck: Ace Combat Zero: The Belkan War is an arcade flight game that chronicles the events 15 years prior to the Circum-Pacific war explored in Ace Combat 5: The Unsung War. The player takes the role of the mercenary Cipher fighting to curb Belkan aggression and restore peace to the continent
results.name: Ace Combat Zero: The Belkan War

results.deck: Alyssa Hamilton must uncover the secrets of her family's bloodline while she is pursued by deranged killers throughout different time periods in this survival horror adventure.
results.name: Clock Tower 3

results.deck: A graphical update of King of Fighters 94 released only in Japan.
results.name: The King of Fighters '94 Re-bout

results.deck: Robot Alchemic Drive places the player in control of the Meganite, a gigantic robot, and is tasked with defending Earth from the invading Volgara monsters.
results.name: Robot Alchemic Drive

results.deck: A Sci-Fi FPS game.
results.name: Headhunter: Redemption

results.deck: Although not actually based on a true story, as the misleading packaging claims, Fatal Frame is still a beloved horror game in which a camera is the player's only weapon against malevolent spirits.
results.name: Fatal Frame

results.deck: The third installment in the Metal Gear Solid franchise is swathed in the Cold War, and it's up to a strangely familiar soldier codenamed Naked Snake to keep the Soviet Union and the United States from all-out nuclear war.
results.name: Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater

results.deck: Rumble Roses is an all female wrestling game made by Konami.
results.name: Rumble Roses

results.deck: The 2007 release of the Need for Speed series and the 11th installment of the popular racing game franchise.
results.name: Need for Speed: ProStreet

results.deck: Kinetica is a futuristic racing game where people wear motorcycle like suits in which they race.
results.name: Kinetica

results.deck: Extermination attempted to take the more ardent concepts of previous survival-horror titles and fuse them with the boiled direction of an action movie.
results.name: Extermination

results.deck: Just Cause is an open-world action game that has you play as Rico Rodriguez, a black-ops agent helping guerrillas to overthrow the government of San Esperito.
results.name: Just Cause
Romance of the Three Kingdoms IX
Garfield: Attack of the Mutant Lasagna

results.deck: NHL 08 takes the simulation of hockey video games to the next level by adding more precise stick handling, and an all new deke button that allows you to separate the puck from your player to skate around defencemen and get scoring chances.
results.name: NHL 08

results.deck: Monster 4x4: Masters of Metal is a Monster Jam licensed monster truck game.
results.name: Monster 4x4: Masters of Metal

results.deck: The King of Fighters 2003 turned out to be the last game in the series released on the Neo-Geo console. Ports with 3D backgrounds were made for other systems. Tag-team gameplay was added and the game introduced lot of new characters.
results.name: The King of Fighters 2003

results.deck: The BIGS is a baseball game developed by 2K Sports. It focuses more on being over the top (giant muscles, long home runs, fast pitches) instead of being a simulator.
results.name: The BIGS

results.deck: Pirates: The Legend of Black Kat is a game set in the pirate era where you play as the protagonist, Kat, a feisty and agile female pirate.
results.name: Pirates: The Legend of Black Kat

results.deck: Naruto: Ultimate Ninja 2 is the second game in the Naruto: Ultimate Ninja Franchise. Adding More Characters and stages as well as a more refined combat system.
results.name: Naruto: Ultimate Ninja 2

results.deck: Ratchet & Clank is a platformer adventure game that follows two heroes, Ratchet and Clank, on their journey to save Ratchet's home planet.
results.name: Ratchet & Clank

results.deck: When North Japan infiltrates South Japan and steals their #1 prototype military device, its a race to stop it before it can cause another civil war.
results.name: Ring of Red

results.deck: Backyard Wrestling 2: There Goes the Neighborhood is an arcade style fighting game loosely based on no holds barred wrestling.
results.name: Backyard Wrestling 2: There Goes the Neighborhood

results.deck: Killer7 follows Harman Smith, a wheelchair-bound assassin with multiple personalities that manifest as seven seemingly supernatural killers. And the premise is the least weird thing about the game.
results.name: Killer7

results.deck: The 2002 entry in Midway's ludicrous baseball series.
results.name: MLB SlugFest 20-03

results.deck: We Love Katamari delivers more of the same gameplay and humor that made Katamari Damacy unique.
results.name: We Love Katamari

results.deck: Looney Tunes Back in Action is an action game based on the Loony Tunes franchise.
results.name: Looney Tunes Back in Action

results.deck: A WW2 fighter plane game.
results.name: Heroes of the Pacific

results.deck: Thrillville: Off the Rails is a theme park simulation video game developed by Frontier Developments. The sequel to the 2006 game Thrillville, it is again published by LucasArts. It was released in North America on October 16, 2007.
results.name: Thrillville: Off the Rails

results.deck: Dead to Rights II is the return of action-hero Jack Slate and his K-9 companion, Shadow, where they find themselves once again in the squalid, mean streets of Grant City, ensnared in a labyrinth of crime, corruption and betrayal.
results.name: Dead to Rights II

results.deck: Return to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and wizardry in Harry Potter's fourth year, this time based directly on the film
results.name: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

results.deck: NASCAR Thunder 2004 features Tony Stewart on the cover and all new grudges and alliances. It is still considered by most as the best Nascar game made by EA SPORTS.
results.name: NASCAR Thunder 2004

results.deck: Based on the animated motion picture, Bee Movie Game allows you to play as Barry B. Benson in a sandbox gameplay setting.
results.name: Bee Movie Game

results.deck: Motor Mayhem: Vehicular Combat League is a vehicle combat game made by BeyondGames and Infogrames in 2001. The game was met with moderately good reviews due to creative characters but lackluster gameplay and received moderate sales to match.
results.name: Motor Mayhem

results.deck: The fourth game in FromSoftware's first-person RPG series King's Field. It is the third game to be released in the United States, and the first in the series to be featured on the PlayStation 2.
results.name: King's Field: The Ancient City

results.deck: NHL 2002 showed the additions of Don Taylor's unique commentary and the NHL Cards mode, which allowed a player to collect cards that would affect give players skill boosts when used in game.
results.name: NHL 2002

results.deck: Multiplayer fighting game that supports up to 4 different players. Uses characters from the Onimusha Blade series and pits them against each other.
results.name: Onimusha: Blade Warriors

results.deck: Sixth installment of the Metal Slug franchise and the first to leave the Neo-Geo hardware. Introduces two new characters from the Ikari Warriors/King of Fighters franchises.
results.name: Metal Slug 6

results.deck: 4x4 EVO is a racing game developed by Terminal Reality for the Windows, Macintosh, PlayStation 2 and Dreamcast.
results.name: 4x4 Evolution

results.deck: Disgaea: Hour of Darkness is a tactical role-playing game for the PlayStation 2, which focuses on the story of Prince Laharl as he aims to become the Overlord of the Netherworld.
results.name: Disgaea: Hour of Darkness

results.deck: The 2005 installment of the FIFA series.
results.name: FIFA Soccer 2005

results.deck: The King of Fighters '95 is the second installment in the King of Fighters series, introducing the ability to customize your team.
results.name: The King of Fighters '95

results.deck: Midway Arcade Treasures is a compilation of the company's biggest games from the 80s.
results.name: Midway Arcade Treasures

results.deck: Jack Skellington is back ... and he's armed to the bone!  Control Tim Burton's Jack Skellington to battle Oogie Boogie for control of Halloween Town.
results.name: Tim Burton's The Nightmare Before Christmas: Oogie's Revenge

results.deck: Eternal Ring is a first-person RPG developed by From Software and published by Agetec, released on the PlayStation 2 in 2000.
results.name: Eternal Ring

results.deck: FightBox is a videogame adaptation of the BBC 2 show of the same name. Players take on the role of created fighters to complete a series of challenges.
results.name: Fightbox

results.deck: The 2001 edition of EA's NASCAR racing sim.
results.name: NASCAR 2001

results.deck: Exile is the third game in the Myst series in which you play the Stranger, a friend of Atrus. In Exile, you must once again clean up a monumental mess created by Atrus' unruly sons.
results.name: Myst III: Exile

results.deck: Ratchet: Deadlocked (releases as Ratchet: Gladiator in Europe and Australia) is the fourth game of the Ratchet & Clank series. Deadlocked places Ratchet's robotic companion, Clank, on the sidelines as a supporting character as Ratchet must survive his time in the Dreadzone to earn everyone's freedom.
results.name: Ratchet: Deadlocked

results.deck: Top Gun: Combat Zones is an arcade flight simulator released on the PS2, PC and later GameCube by Titus.
results.name: Top Gun: Combat Zones

results.deck: The last entry in the Tekken series to appear on the PlayStation 2, Tekken 5 continues the ongoing saga of the King of the Iron Fist Tournament.
results.name: Tekken 5
